scripts.extract-frames: npx rimraf video/frames && npx mkdirp video/frames && ffmpeg -i video/video.mp4 -vf fps=30 video/frames/frame%04d.jpeg
scripts.zip-text: echo Zipping text file && cd video && npx bestzip ../public/braille.zip braille.txt
scripts.start: npm run extract-frames && node . && npm run zip-text && npm run serve
scripts.gh-pages-deploy: git subtree --prefix public push origin gh-pages
